title: Keep The Right Perspective | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Keep The Right Perspective | Victoria Osteen
description:
The first step to living an extraordinary life is to learn to see yourself the way God sees you. You are His masterpiece, and you were created for an extraordinary purpose! 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
